programme.title: The Paul Finebaum Show [NEW]
programme.desc: Veteran writer, reporter and radio personality Paul Finebaum built a legion of loyal sports fans as the "Voice of the SEC" during 20 years hosting his Birmingham, Ala.-based radio talk show. When ESPN launched the SEC Network in 2014, it was only natural that Finebaum became its first on-air hire, bringing his radio show -- and those passionate followers -- with him. Now originating from one of the SEC Network studios in Charlotte, N.C., the show is a forum for lively discussion and debate of all things SEC and across the spectrum of college sports, with Finebaum playing the role of both moderator and provocateur. The show airs weekday afternoons throughout the year on SEC Network.

programme.title: SEC Now [NEW]
programme.desc: The flagship news and information program of the SEC Network -- ESPN's 24/7 multiplatform sports network devoted to the Southeastern Conference -- is "SEC Now," broadcast weekdays from the network's studios in Charlotte, N.C. Hosted by Dari Nowkhah, Peter Burns or Alyssa Lang, the show includes a mix of sports coverage, in-depth features, insider access, and exclusive interviews with the movers and shakers of the conference's 14 teams.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Lions (2-1) face the No. 3 Tigers (3-0) in Death Valley. LSU held its ranking and improved to 3-0 for the first time since 2019 after doubling up rival Florida 20-10 in Week 3. LSU blanked Southeastern Louisiana 31-0 in the last meeting in 2018.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Bulldogs (3-0) finish their tune-up for the SEC schedule by hosting the Huskies (1-1). Mississippi State followed up its upset victory over Arizona State by waxing FCS Alcorn State 63-0. This is the first time these schools have squared off.

programme.desc: A limited series on Southern food and culture. John T. Edge writes and hosts the show and is executive produced by Wright Thompson. programme.desc: The No. 23 Tigers begin SEC play against the Gamecocks. LaNorris Sellers was knocked out of the game with a helmet-to-helmet hit in South Carolina's 31-7 home loss to Vanderbilt. South Carolina halted Missouri's five-game series win streak last year.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The No. 22 Tigers (3-0, 0-0 SEC) and No. 11 Sooners (3-0, 0-0) kick off their conference slates. Last season, in their first meeting since the 2017 Sugar Bowl, Oklahoma beat Auburn 27-21. Sooners linebacker Kip Lewis grabbed a pick-six in the win.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Mr Cat's Cafe: Peppa is on a play date with Candy Cat at Mr Cat's Cafe. Candy show Mr Cat the drawings they've done of everyone, and he hangs them up for everyone to see.

programme.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: King Thistle has a cold and needs medicine. Nanny Plum, Holly and Ben have fun collecting the ingredients for a magic potion to make him better.

programme.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Ben, Holly and Gaston the Ladybird find a large egg in the meadow. A tiny chick hatches from the egg and the children must find the mummy bird.

programme.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Ben is in training for the elf games, Holly wants to join in but the rules state there is absolutely no flying or magic allowed. Ben gives Holly a chance to join in without using magic.

programme.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Nanny Plum is teaching the fairy girls some important fairy rules when she is blown away, trapped in a tree, dropped in a stream and covered in mud.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Owls face the No. 18 Yellow Jackets at Bobby Dodd Stadium. Georgia Tech is off to its first 3-0 start since 2016 after upsetting then-No. 12 Clemson 24-21 at home Sept. 13. Jackets quarterback Haynes King ran for 103 yards and a TD in the win.

programme.desc: The Orange take on the Tigers. Syracuse quarterback Steve Angeli threw for 382 yards and five touchdowns during a 66-24 drubbing of Colgate on Sept. 12. Clemson slipped from the top 25 after a 24-21 setback at Georgia Tech to begin ACC play Sept. 13.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Golden Flashes (1-2) line up against the No. 7 Seminoles (2-0). Florida has been off since thrashing East Texas A&M 77-3 on Sept. 6. The Seminoles piled up 729 yards of offense in that contest, with running back Gavin Sawchuk scoring three TDs.

programme.desc: The Gators visit the No. 4 Hurricanes in a Florida Cup contest. In 2024, Miami won the first renewal of the three-way rivalry series in five years, beating Florida 41-17 in the process. Miami comes off a 49-12 beatdown of then-No. 18 South Florida.

programme.desc: The No. 8 Seminoles and Cavaliers meet for the first time since 2019. Florida State has outscored its foes 174-30 in 2025. Chandler Morris (UVA) passed for 380 yards and created five touchdowns in a 48-20 win over Stanford in Week 4.

programme.title: ACC Huddle [NEW]

programme.title: College Football [NEW]
programme.desc: The Blue Devils (2-2, 1-0 ACC) visit the Orange (3-1, 1-0). Duke has won both road contests against Syracuse since the Orange joined the conference in 2013. Syracuse stunned Clemson in Week 4, but lost quarterback Steve Angeli for the season.

programme.title: College Football [NEW]
programme.desc: The Golden Bears (3-1, 0-0) and Eagles (1-2, 0-1) meet for the second time, but first as ACC adversaries. Boston College beat California 21-15 in 1986. BC sophomore Dylan Lonergan, an Alabama transfer, has passed for 991 yards and nine touchdowns.

programme.desc: The Cardinal (1-3) and Spartans (1-2) play another edition of the Bill Walsh Legacy Game. Last year, San Jose Staté snapped a six-game series skid during the first meeting in more than a decade with its first victory over Stanford since 2006.

programme.title: Parker
programme.desc: Daring, ruthless and meticulous, Parker (Jason Statham) is one of the most successful thieves in the business. But when his latest robbery turns deadly because of a careless crew member, he declines to join crime boss Melander (Michael Chiklis) and his gang for another heist. The crooks turn on Parker and leave him for dead. Parker survives and vows vengeance, tracing the gang to Palm Beach. There, he joins forces with an unlikely ally (Jennifer Lopez) to hijack the gang's next big score.

programme.title: The Equalizer
programme.desc: Robert McCall (Denzel Washington), a man of mysterious origin who believes he has put the past behind him, dedicates himself to creating a quiet new life. However, when he meets Teri (Chloë Grace Moretz), a teenager who has been manhandled by violent Russian mobsters, he simply cannot walk away. With his set of formidable skills, McCall comes out of self-imposed retirement and emerges as an avenging angel, ready to take down anyone who brutalizes the helpless.

programme.title: The Equalizer 2
programme.desc: Robert McCall's mysterious past cuts especially close to home when thugs kill Susan Plummer, his best friend and former colleague. Now out for revenge, McCall must take on a crew of highly trained assassins who'll stop at nothing to destroy him.

programme.title: Liberty Stands Still
programme.desc: As the heir and current marketing director for one of the nation's biggest gun manufacturers, Liberty Wallace (Linda Fiorentino) is indifferent to the atrocities made possible through her business and her CEO husband, Victor (Oliver Platt). On her way to see her actor lover, Liberty ends up chained to a food cart full of explosives -- all at the insistence of Joe (Wesley Snipes), a sniper whose young daughter was a victim of gun violence, and who now has Liberty in his sights.

programme.title: I Spy
programme.desc: When the Switchblade, the most sophisticated prototype stealth fighter created yet, is stolen from the U.S. government, one of the United States' top spies, Alex Scott (Owen Wilson), is called to action. What he doesn't expect is to get teamed up with a cocky civilian, World Class Boxing Champion Kelly Robinson (Eddie Murphy), on a dangerous top secret espionage mission. Their assignment: using equal parts skill and humor, catch Arnold Gundars, one of the world's most successful arms dealers.

A New York detective (Steve Zahn) arrives on the scene to bring the ladies in, but instead they win him over to their side.

programme.title: Blue Streak
programme.desc: When a heist goes wrong, thief Miles hides a diamond at a construction site before he's arrested. After serving two years, Miles returns to the location of his treasure and finds it is now a police station. Disguising himself as a recently transferred officer to infiltrate the building, Miles stops an escaping thief while trying to retrieve the jewel. Impressed by his quick action, superior Rizzo partners him with the bumbling detective Casey.

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: After a slew of traffic accidents, police detective Andy Washburn is demoted and has his driver's license revoked by his lieutenant. While on duty one day, Andy learns of a bank robbery and hails a taxi driven by new cabbie Belle. They lose the robbers in a chase through New York City, and Belle's taxi is impounded. Andy promises to get the car back for Belle if she helps him catch the thieves.

programme.desc: When the children become obsessed with gifts, Bernie decides to cancel Christmas altogether; Wanda loses the Christmas spirit when she tries to get everyone on her staff a gift.

programme.title: Two Can Play That Game
programme.desc: When it comes to matters of the heart, keeping her man happy and committed is all in a day's work for Shanté Smith (Vivica A. Fox). Shanté is so adept at navigating the waters of romance that her best girlfriends depend on her for advice whenever man trouble clouds the horizon. But when Shanté's boyfriend Keith (Morris Chestnut) is caught red-handed stepping out with her archrival Conny (Gabrielle Union), Shanté institutes her Ten Day Plan to get her man in line.

programme.title: Down to Earth
programme.desc: When amateur comedian Lance Barton (Chris Rock) finds himself at Heaven's door, he is convinced there has been a mistake. Miraculously he is right. Since returning to his own body is not an option, a heavenly agent places him into the corpse of a rich Manhattan mogul who has just been murdered by his wife -- until a more suitable replacement can be found. Ironically, it is as this new person that Lance ultimately discovers his true self, falls in love and improves his comedy act in the process.

programme.title: Bringing Down the House
programme.desc: Lawyer Peter Sanderson (Steve Martin) wants to dive back into dating after his divorce and has a hard time meeting the right women. But he lucks out with online dating and meets a fellow lawyer. The two agree to meet in the flesh, but the woman he meets -- an escaped African-American convict named Charlene (Queen Latifah) -- is not what he expected. Peter is freaked out, but Charlene convinces him to take her case and prove her innocence, and along the way they learn to become friends.

programme.title: Death at a Funeral
programme.desc: Preparing for a funeral is never pleasant, but for Aaron, it is shaping up to be the worst day of his life. Sibling rivalry, meddling family members, and a little stranger with a big secret threaten to blow the lid off the coffin when Aaron struggles to give his late father a proper memorial.

programme.title: Good Deeds
programme.desc: For all his life, wealthy businessman Wesley Deeds (Tyler Perry) has done what's expected of him and has settled into a predictable routine. His life begins to change, however, when he meets Lindsey Wakefield (Thandie Newton), a struggling single mother who has just been evicted. Wesley offers to help Lindsey get back on her feet and, though he's already engaged, romantic sparks begin to fly. Suddenly, Wesley finds himself torn between what is expected of him and what he really wants.

programme.title: I Think I Love My Wife
programme.desc: Attraction to a free-spirited woman (Kerry Washington) causes a man (Chris Rock) to question the happiness he feels with his family. Nikki makes all of Richard's daydreams come true, but his busy. career-driven wife Brenda (Gina Torres) barely has time for him.

programme.title: Strictly Business
programme.desc: Waymon (Joseph C. Phillips) has a great job in real estate and a promising future, but he's also trapped in a loveless longterm relationship. He meets Natalie (Halle Berry), a beautiful club-hopping hipster, and quickly falls in love. Realizing he's just not cool enough to attract her on his own, he seeks the help of his friend Bobby (Tommy Davidson), a free-spirited smooth talker who works in the mail room at Waymon's firm and utilizes the predicament as leverage to advance in the company.

programme.title: Harlem Nights
programme.desc: In the waning days of Prohibition, Sugar Ray (Richard Pryor) and his adopted son, Quick (Eddie Murphy), run a speakeasy called Club Sugar Ray. When gangster Bugsy Calhoune (Michael Lerner) learns that Sugar Ray's place is pulling in more money than his own establishment, the Pitty Pat Club, he pays corrupt cop Phil Cantone (Danny Aiello) to close Club Sugar Ray down. Quick doesn't exactly help the situation when he falls for Calhoune's gun moll, Miss Dominique La Rue (Jasmine Guy).

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: During Prohibition, loudmouth Harlem grifter Ray (Eddie Murphy) and the no-nonsense Claude (Martin Lawrence) team up on a bootlegging mission to Mississippi that could bring them big bucks. But they run into trouble when a crooked lawman hits them with a phony murder charge. Ray and Claude are given life sentences and shipped off to jail, where they must think of a way to prove their innocence and avoid the brutal guards while battling their biggest enemies -- their opposing personalities.

programme.title: Boomerang
programme.desc: A cocky ad executive, Marcus (Eddie Murphy) has a reputation as a ladies' man. However, Marcus gets a taste of his own medicine when a merger finds him working under the beautiful Jacqueline (Robin Givens), who has a similarly cavalier attitude about romance. Marcus and Jacqueline become involved, but he is put off by her noncommittal approach to their relationship. Meanwhile, Marcus also begins to develop feelings for the pretty Angela (Halle Berry), who is more thoughtful than Jacqueline.

programme.title: Payroll
programme.desc: British crime thriller starring Billie Whitelaw. When Jackie's husband - an armoured van driver - is killed in a heist, she vows to unmask those responsible and take her revenge.

programme.title: Three Hours to Kill
programme.desc: Western starring Dana Andrews. A man falsely accused of murder gets a last-minute reprieve from the lynch mob so he can track down the real culprit.

programme.title: Born Free
programme.desc: Gem of a family drama based on a true story. After a life in captivity, can lioness Elsa learn to survive in the wild? Starring Virginia McKenna and John Barry's Oscar-winning score.

programme.title: Jumanji: The Next Level
programme.desc: Adventure comedy sequel with Dwayne Johnson, Jack Black, Kevin Hart and Karen Gillan. The old school pals enter the Jumanji video game again to save their friend.

programme.title: Deadpool 2
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds returns as the potty-mouthed, can of whup-ass-opening superhero and now he's got buddies to help him take on baddie Josh Brolin in the all-out action comedy sequel.

programme.title: Carlito's Way
programme.desc: Brian De Palma's crime thriller with Al Pacino. An ex-con, fresh out of jail, flamboyantly declares his plan to go straight. But his criminal past just won't let him go..

programme.title: Career Girls
programme.desc: Mike Leigh's poingnant drama stars Katrin Cartlidge and Lynda Steadman as old college friends who meet up only to discover they still suffer from emotional fragility.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The 300 Spartans
programme.desc: Historical drama with Ralph Richardson. A retelling of the stand made at Thermopylae in 480 BC by a small Greek force against invasion by an enormous Persian army.

programme.title: Footsteps in the Fog
programme.desc: Atmospheric Victorian melodrama. Stewart Granger plays a sinister aristocrat who poisons his wife. However, his maid (Jean Simmons) knows his secret and tries to use it against him.

programme.title: Nothing But the Best
programme.desc: Classic British dark comedy with Alan Bates and Denholm Elliott. An ambitious estate agent's clerk hires a toff to teach him to be posh. Couldn't possibly lead to murder, could it.

programme.title: The Blue Lamp
programme.desc: Gritty noir thriller from Ealing Studios. A rookie PC hunts a vicious killer across blitz-battered London. With Jimmy Hanley, Dirk Bogarde and Jack Warner as PC George Dixon.

programme.title: Dante's Peak
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Pierce Brosnan and Linda Hamilton. The inhabitants of a volcano-side resort unwisely ignore a scientist's warning about its imminent eruption.

programme.title: The Mechanic
programme.desc: Thriller with Jason Statham and Donald Sutherland. A hitman is ordered to kill his mentor, but then takes on the dead man's son as an apprentice. Could get complicated... and deadly.

programme.title: Wild Card
programme.desc: Sin City thriller with Jason Statham. A compulsive gambler who does favours for money just wants out of the Vegas life. Just one big win at the tables should do it..

programme.title: The Long Good Friday
programme.desc: Bob Hoskins and Helen Mirren star in John MacKenzie's East London gangster thriller. Gang leader Hoskins' hold over his empire is under threat.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Think Like a Dog
programme.desc: Cheeky comedy with Megan Fox. A young science prodigy (Gabriel Bateman) invents a piece of tech that lets him and his pet dog communicate with each other telepathically.

programme.title: The Muppets Take Manhattan
programme.desc: It's time to put on make-up. It's time to light the lights. Kermit, Miss Piggy, Fozzy, the Blues one and the gang embark on a musical adventure as they try to make it on Broadway.

programme.title: Dunston Checks In
programme.desc: Comedy starring Faye Dunaway and Rupert Everett. A hotel owner's attempt to upgrade her star rating is undermined by the arrival of a master thief and his light-fingered orangutan.

programme.title: Time Bandits
programme.desc: Fantasy comedy. David Rappaport stars as the leader of rebel dwarves who kidnap a boy, Craig Warnock, and take him on adventures across time. With Sean Connery and John Cleese.

programme.title: Cowboys & Aliens
programme.desc: Sci-fi western starring Daniel Craig and Harrison Ford. A brutal cattle baron and his amnesiac enemy must cease their feuding when a town is attacked by aliens.

programme.title: Plane
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Gerard Butler as an airline pilot who must become a one-man army after crashlanding on an island overrun by bad guys. To survive, he's gonna have to wing it.

programme.title: The Predator
programme.desc: Unrestrained reboot of the franchise defined by a ruthless extraterrestrial killer whose name says it all... and it's had a DNA upgrade. All the better to kill you with, my dear.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: S16 E19 Rogue Wave Juggernaut A rare weather event churns up rogue waves as supermoon tides collide with a cyclonic snowstorm. Josh and Casey face a 55-foot monster, while Jake risks capsizing to repair his rudder in unruly seas. Monte's big move north pays off in massive pots.

programme.title: Barnwood Builders
programme.desc: S15 E2 Bigtime Barnwood In Corry, Pennsylvania, the Barnwood Builders save one of the biggest barns they've ever seen; along the way, Sherman shares farming stories with the barn owner, and Mark explores the nearby wetlands designed for conservation.

programme.title: Barnwood Builders
programme.desc: S15 E5 Modern Day Homestead Mark and the guys create a rustic family gathering place in Franklin, Tenn. for a homeowner who loves 19th century hand-hewed craftsmanship; the property sits on a former horse farm that now serves as a dog rehabilitation camp.

programme.title: Ed Stafford: First Man Out
programme.desc: S1 E1 Borneo Ed Stafford challenges ropes expert and ultra-fit former Royal Marine Aldo Kane into embarking on a race across the crocodile-infested mangrove swamps of Borneo.

programme.title: Naked and Afraid XL : Surviving With Sharks
programme.desc: S5 E3 With resources dwindling, the survivalists risk their lives entering the shark-infested South China Sea in search of a meal they all desperately need.

programme.title: Naked and Afraid XL : Lightning on the Open Seas
programme.desc: S5 Desperate and depleted by their 60-day challenge, Jeff and Laura fish the South China Sea but are caught in a dangerous electrical storm on the open water; the brutal conditions on both land and sea lead to the Philippines claiming its first victim.

programme.title: Gold Divers

programme.title: Deadliest Catch

programme.title: Deadliest Catch

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters

programme.title: She's All That
programme.desc: High school hotshot Zach Siler (Freddie Prinze Jr.) is the envy of his peers. But his popularity declines sharply when his cheerleader girlfriend, Taylor (Jodi Lyn O'Keefe), leaves him for sleazy reality-television star Brock Hudson (Matthew Lillard). Desperate to revive his fading reputation, Siler agrees to a seemingly impossible challenge. He has six weeks to gain the trust of nerdy outcast Laney Boggs (Rachael Leigh Cook) -- and help her to become the school's next prom queen.

programme.title: Underclassman
programme.desc: Thanks to his boyish appearance, young cop Tre Stokes (Nick Cannon) scores an undercover assignment at a California high school in order to break up a stolen-car ring. Although Tre is on the good side of his superior, Capt. Delgado (Cheech Marin), he still has his work cut out for him, since the criminal ties at the school go deeper than he expected. While Tre's new friend, Rob (Shawn Ashmore), is involved in the thefts, he must figure out the identity of the person behind the whole operation.

programme.title: Clueless
programme.desc: Shallow, rich and socially successful Cher (Alicia Silverstone) is at the top of her Beverly Hills high school's pecking scale. Seeing herself as a matchmaker, Cher first coaxes two teachers into dating each other. Emboldened by her success, she decides to give hopelessly klutzy new student Tai (Brittany Murphy) a makeover. When Tai becomes more popular than she is, Cher realizes that her disapproving ex-stepbrother (Paul Rudd) was right about how misguided she was -- and falls for him.

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Diary
programme.desc: At the start of the New Year, 32-year-old Bridget (Renée Zellweger) decides it's time to take control of her life -- and start keeping a diary. Now, the most provocative, erotic and hysterical book on her bedside table is the one she's writing. With a taste for adventure, and an opinion on every subject - from exercise to men to food to sex and everything in between - she's turning the page on a whole new life.

programme.title: Almost Famous
programme.desc: Set in 1973, it chronicles the funny and often poignant coming of age of 15-year-old William, an unabashed music fan who is inspired by the seminal bands of the time. When his love of music lands him an assignment from Rolling Stone magazine to interview the up-and-coming band Stillwater -- fronted by lead guitar Russell Hammond and lead singer Jeff Bebe William embarks on an eye-opening journey with the band's tour, despite the objections of his protective mother.

programme.title: Maid in Manhattan
programme.desc: The story of Marisa Ventura (Jennifer Lopez), a single mother born and bred in the boroughs of New York City, who works as a maid in a first-class Manhattan hotel. By a twist of fate and mistaken identity, Marisa meets Christopher Marshall (Ralph Fiennes), heir to a political dynasty, who believes that she is a guest at the hotel. Fate steps in and throws the pair together for a magical night of romance. When Marisa's true identity is revealed, the two find that they are worlds apart.

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: For most, teaching is an honorable profession -- except for Elizabeth (Cameron Diaz). The foul-mouthed, boozy woman can't wait to marry a rich man and quit her job, but she has to rethink her plans when her sugar daddy dumps her. Then Scott Delacorte (Justin Timberlake), a substitute teacher who's cute and rich, arrives. Elizabeth can't wait to sink her teeth into a new meal ticket, but she faces stiff competition from Amy (Lucy Punch), a popular and perky colleague.

programme.desc: Arizona Cardinals v Seattle Seahawks (Kick-off 1.15am). Coverage of the week four match at State Farm Stadium in Glendale. programme.title: Who Had The Most Hits in the 80s?

programme.title: Closing Bell [NEW]
programme.desc: A guide through the most important hour of the Wall Street trading day, and taking a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what's driving them and how investors are reacting; coverage includes reports from the CME Group, NASDAQ and the NYSE.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime [NEW]
programme.desc: A look at after-hours moves, including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading; big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day.

programme.title: Fast Money [NEW]
programme.desc: The information normally reserved for the Wall Street trading floor, enabling viewers to make decisions that give them a chance to make money; the news with an angle that won't be seen until tomorrow's papers.

programme.title: Mad Money [NEW]
programme.desc: Taking viewers inside the mind of one of Wall Street's most respected and successful money managers; Jim Cramer guides viewers through the confusing jungle of Wall Street investing, navigating through both opportunities and pitfalls.

programme.title: Shark Tank
programme.desc: A portable tool that instantly turns any standard dumbbell into a dynamic workout; a product to help soothe anxiety; a device that allows for blowing out birthday candles without spreading germs; a chicken coop creation built by Amish craftsmen.

programme.title: Shark Tank
programme.desc: Sustainable teeth-cleaning products; a solution for packing light and traveling easier with baby gear; a healthier version of a decadent treat; a customizable eyewear product line for kids; Katrina Lake guest judges.

programme.title: Shark Tank
programme.desc: A kit for teaching how to create cuddly animal characters; a trussing device designed to cook the perfect bird; a company that provides convenient personal storage for medical necessities; an update on Beatbox Beverages.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: A well-respected lawyer from a prominent family is accused of stealing millions from the suffering clients who turn to him for help.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: A sprawling investigation into the prominent and powerful Murdaugh family uncovers years of unchecked power and privilege that has allegedly resulted in years of fraud, conspiracy, corruption and even murder.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: An Iowa man rigs a $16.5 million lottery jackpot, triggering the biggest lottery scam in American history; notorious New York City landlord Steven Croman finds a new home in jail.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: Personal injury attorney Tom Girardi posits himself as a champion for the little guy, but jilted clients cry foul when they discover him cheating them out of millions in settlement money as his wife flaunts her wealth on reality television.

programme.desc: After Todd Chance is murdered, police follow a trail of video evidence as they work to track down the killer.

programme.title: Hero Inside
programme.desc: The Darkest Night: With Dirk O's order to steal a Hero Book, Black Knight accidentally sets a house on fire, and Mike uses Crying Man to put out the fire and saves people. (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Itch: Grizzy discovers that the frenzied dance the lemmings are doing is actually due to the fleas they are infested with. When Grizzy catches them too, it's panic all round! (S1 Ep13)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug...
programme.desc: ...and Cat Noir: Pigeon 72: Mr. Ramier gets akumatized into M. Pigeon for the 72nd time, and now, he can turn people into evil pigeons! To stop him, Ladybug will have to ruffle his feathers. (S4 Ep4)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug...
programme.desc: ...and Cat Noir: Psycomedian: A comedian gets akumatized into Psycomedian. Able to impose any emotions on anyone, he wants to wipe the smiles off faces... starting with Ladybug and Cat Noir! (S4 Ep5)

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.desc: Goku the Talented Scout: Recruit Krillin and Android 18: Krillin must prove himself to both Gohan and Goku if he wants to enter the Tournament of Power. (S2 Ep84)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Sevens
programme.desc: Helping a Friend: After Yuga's loss to Nail - Luke, Gavin and Romin risk everything to help Yuga - including their ability to ever duel again!! (S1 Ep24)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug...
programme.desc: ...and Cat Noir: Penalteam: When one of Shadow Moth's favorite victims is akumatized into Penalteam, a fearsome team of supervillains, Ladybug calls on her own superheroes to face her. (S4 Ep24)

programme.title: Kipo and the Age of Wonderbeasts
programme.desc: Benson and the Beast: After meeting Dr. Emilia and the Human Resistance, Kipo and her team go back to their headquarters to try to help Kipo get her strength and courage back. (S2 Ep7)

programme.title: Kipo and the Age of Wonderbeasts
programme.desc: Sympathy for the Mandrill: In an episode existing mostly in flashback, Scarlemagne uses the time with captured Kipo to relive his haunting backstory of his life as a science experiment. (S2 Ep8)

programme.title: New: Unicorn Academy
programme.desc: The Wrong Crowd: Sophia races to Starglow Lake to battle the Star Snatcher for the last crown star. Back at the dorms, Rory tries out for a secret society of pranksters. (S2 Ep8)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Prints: Grizzy discovers that he can print images taken with the ranger's camera which is connected to a state-of-the-art printer. (S1 Ep47)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Inspector Grizzy: A van pulls up to the ranger's cabin to deliver a crate of chocolate spread. While Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a wrecking bar to open it, someone steals the crate. (S1 Ep48)

programme.title: Pokémon Ultimate Journeys:
programme.desc: The Series: Radio Lulled The Mischievous Stars!: Team Rocket may be up to their usual tricks, but their latest plot to recruit new members involves something uniquely entertaining! (S25 Ep16)

programme.title: Pokémon Ultimate Journeys:...
programme.desc: ...The Series: Big Brother to the Rescue!: Ash and Goh are in Cerise Park, looking after the Pokémon living there. Chloe is also there photographing Pokémon. (S25 Ep17)

programme.title: Pokémon Ultimate Journeys:
programme.desc: The Series: Catching the Aura of Fate!: Ash is training fiercely for his upcoming Masters Eight entrance battle against Raihan, when Goh's Froakie evolve into Frogadier, he gets an idea! (S25 Ep18)

programme.title: She-Ra and the Princesses of Power
programme.desc: White Out: On the outskirts of the Kingdom of Snows, the Best Friend Squad and Sea Hawk investigate the Horde's presence. (S1 Ep18)

programme.title: She-Ra and the Princesses of Power
programme.desc: Light Spinner: As Shadow Weaver languishes in her Horde prison cell, she recalls her old life as the sorceress Light Spinner and her time in Mystacor with her apprentice, Micah. (S1 Ep19)

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.desc: Where Does the Dream Go!? Look for Super Saiyan God!: Beerus tries to discover the unbeatable foe from his dream, and Supreme Kai seeks information about Beerus and Goku. (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Best Friends: Draculaura and Toralei are magically stuck together on Ghoul Spirit Day while Clawdeen and Frankie track down a Codex. (S1 Ep41)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Scareer Day: On Scareer Day, Heath and his dad Hades must work together to save the school from a swarm of vicious pixies. (S1 Ep42)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Stone Alone: Deuce prepares for a trip but his twin sisters try to scare him out of the idea, thinking he can't be independent. (S1 Ep43)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Horsin' Around: Clawd must evade Bloodgood's horse, Nightmare, to catch the Blood Thirsty Bandit who's been stealing talismans. (S1 Ep44)

programme.title: Kipo and the Age of Wonderbeasts
programme.desc: Age of the Wonderbeast: Just when Kipo and her friends think that PRHAM is going to be the answer to solve all their problems, Emilia shows up with a way to destroy everything. (S3 Ep10)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug...
programme.desc: ...and Cat Noir: Psycomedian: A comedian gets akumatized into Psycomedian. Able to impose any emotions on anyone, he wants to wipe the smiles off faces... starting with Ladybug and Cat Noir! (S4 Ep5)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug...
programme.desc: ...and Cat Noir: Furious Fu: Ladybug and Cat Noir face someone they know well... and never imagined they would have to fight someday. (S4 Ep6)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Super Grizzy Bros: Grizzy discovers the joy of video games on the ranger's console. The lemmings want to try their hand at the joystick but Grizzy refuses to interrupt his racing game. (S1 Ep24)

programme.title: The Inbestigators

programme.title: The Inbestigators
programme.desc: The Case of the Misplaced Mug / The Case of the Sad Little Sister: Mr McGillick is upset after he loses his precious 'World's Best Principal' mug. (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: Shasha and Milo: Shorts
programme.desc: Multiplying Minions: Sundae's multiplying device proves you really can be your own worst enemy. (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug
programme.desc: and Cat Noir: Dearest Family: Galette day this year is eventful for Marinette; Tikki is acting very strange and three supervillains show up! (S4 Ep21)

programme.title: Totally Spies
programme.desc: Creepy Crawly Creature Catcher: The hottest new game just got real when digital creepy crawlies run riot! (S7 Ep4)

programme.title: Jade Armor
programme.desc: The Filter: When a Shard makes emojis, social media filters, Likes, and more appear "IRL", the city is one big popularity contest. (S1 Ep21)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Earworm: Frustrated at her classmates, Toralei and her band release earworms that control everyone's thoughts. (S1 Ep29)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Growing Ghoulia: Ghoulia tries to get the top spot on Monster High's Horror Roll but unleashes a zombie invasion. (S1 Ep30)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Cleo in the Kitchen: Cleo tries to make a home-cooked meal to raise Clawdeen's spirits and cure her homesickness. (S1 Ep31)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Case of the Missing Squeak: Ghoulia helps Lagoona find her precious, secret toy, inspecting all of their classmates for the culprit. (S1 Ep32)

programme.title: LEGO Friends: The Next Chapter
programme.desc: Fake News Frenzy!: Liann takes over as editor of the school news channel but realizes there is nothing exciting to report so she enlists Nova's help to create some news. (S3 Ep1)

programme.title: LEGO Friends: The Next Chapter
programme.desc: Rescue that Piano!: When the piano at the community center breaks on the day of the recital, Paisley, Zac and Olly need to get a new one across town in time. (S3 Ep2)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Manufacturing Secret: Grizzy has run out of chocolate spread. He realises that the Lemmings are making their own. If they can make it, then why can't he? But first, he needs the recipe! (S1 Ep43)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bling Bling Bear: Inspired by a magazine showing a man offering a diamond to a woman, Grizzy imagines himself offering the ranger's engagement ring to his beloved she-bear. (S1 Ep44)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Intellectual Bear: When he accidentally sticks a computer microprocessor to his head, Grizzy is transformed into a being capable of predicting events to come far in advance. (S1 Ep45)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Voodoo Blanket: The Lemmings prepare a dream afternoon snack with the last jar of chocolate spread in the cupboard. (S1 Ep46)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Prints: Grizzy discovers that he can print images taken with the ranger's camera which is connected to a state-of-the-art printer. (S1 Ep47)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Inspector Grizzy: A van pulls up to the ranger's cabin to deliver a crate of chocolate spread. While Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a wrecking bar to open it, someone steals the crate. (S1 Ep48)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Out of Step: Afraid to be embarrassed at a dance-off, Draculaura gives her dance partner, Clawd, enchanted dancing shoes. (S1 Ep13)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: What's Up Watzie: Frankie doesn't want Watzie to migrate with other dragons, so she sets up activities for him to do instead. (S1 Ep14)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Pyramid Scheme: Cleo wants the lead role for the school play and raids her family's ancient tomb for a perfect, superior costume. (S1 Ep15)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Crushed: Frankie doesn't make the fearleading team. They bottle up their feelings and cause unintended electrical outbursts. (S1 Ep16)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Sniffer Sniffler Raccoon: Grizzy's last jar of chocolate spread has been pinched by the Lemmings, who are savouring it in secret. (S1 Ep67)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Transformational Bear: Grizzy uses the Lemmings' radio-controlled toy robot as a butler. (S1 Ep68)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Shaken-Up Bear: The vibrations created by Grizzy's snoring during his nap give the Lemmings an idea for a bouncing game. (S1 Ep69)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Piñata Party: Grizzy finds a birthday piñata in the ranger's living room. (S1 Ep70)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Game: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a magical Game of the Goose. The events displayed in the squares that the players land on come true in real life. (S1 Ep71)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Ranger Lemming: Grizzy is bothered by an object stuck in between the sofa cushions: a big fur lemming puppet glove. (S1 Ep72)

programme.title: LEGO DreamZzz
programme.desc: Everything's Changed: The dream chaser's jobs are on the line now that the dream world is under the guardianship of a mysterious new hero called "Dreamsmasher." (S3 Ep1)

programme.title: LEGO DreamZzz
programme.desc: Join The Club: After an argument, Z-Blob refuses to follow Mateo back into the waking world, inspiring them to take two very different journeys of self-discovery. (S3 Ep2)

programme.title: Vets: Gach Creutair Beo
programme.desc: Fiadh ruadh ann an Uibhist, ùr-bhreith ann an Inbhir Ùige & cù a tha truagh ann am Farfar. A red deer in North Uist, lambs and calves in Wick and a dog in Forfar is gravely ill.

programme.title: Miann na Maighdinn-mara: Slighe gu Deas (Mermaid Tales
programme.desc: 1/3. Kate travels to Heisker, the beautiful islands west of North Uist.

programme.title: Faodail: Found
programme.desc: 1/4. The Faodail Film Archive celebrates lost indigenous films and showcases them to communities across the Outer Hebrides.

programme.title: Dàna - Scotland's Wild Side
programme.desc: Coinneach Rankin travels to Torridon in both summer and winter to see what it can offer the mountaineer year-round.

programme.title: Transatlantic Sessions: Dluth an Daimh
programme.desc: 6/6. Featuring songs from Julie Fowlis along with fellow musical stars, including Martha Wainwright and Liam Ó Maonlaí. Contains some strong language.

programme.title: Leonardo da Vinci - Deisciobal an Eòlais/The Disciple of Experience
programme.desc: Leonardo da Vinci grows up in a Tuscan village surrounded by nature, then moves to Florence, where the Renaissance is in full bloom.

programme.title: Alba Today
programme.desc: Sealladh ùr bho Alba. A new view from Scotland.

programme.title: Alba Today
programme.desc: Sealladh ùr bho Alba. A new view from Scotland.

programme.title: Sionnach agus Maigheach (Fox & Hare)
programme.desc: 13/26. Seal organises a swimming contest in the lake. Owl decides to sign up.

programme.title: Abadas
programme.desc: The word is cocoon. The Abadas take to the garden, where they must search high and low for the very special find.

programme.title: AH-AH/No-No
programme.desc: Tha rudeigin a' toirt air AH-AH sreathartaich - ach dè th' ann? Something is making AH-AH sneeze, but what can it be.

programme.title: Cleasan Ataidh & Tilidh/The Adventures of Abney & Teal
programme.desc: Abney finds a whistle. When he plays it, a beautiful rainbow appears in the sky.

programme.title: Pompon Am Mathan Beag/Pompon Little Bear
programme.desc: 22/39. Tha Pompon a' sealltainn a sgilean dhraoidheachd dha phàrantan 's iad uile anns a' choille. Pompon shows his parents magician skills while they are all in the woods.

programme.title: Stòiridh
programme.desc: Siùsaidh NicDhonnchaidh a' leughadh Dè Bheir air Lìomair Èisteachd? Suzie Roberts reads Dè Bheir air Lìomair Èisteachd.

programme.title: An Doimhne/The Deep
programme.desc: 13/13. Bheil Alpheus Benthos dha-rìribh air geataichean Lemuria a lorg? Has Alpheus Benthos really found the gates to Lemuria.

programme.title: Naidheachdan Neònach CBBC ALBA
programme.desc: Calum Macdonald introduces his personal highlights from the craziest news show on BBC ALBA.

programme.title: An Saoghal Droil aig Pol Ploc/The Rubbish World of Dave Spud
programme.desc: The people of Grimsby believe the Twins are wise lifestyle gurus, able to predict what everyone wants before they know it themselves.

programme.title: An Saoghal Droil aig Pol Ploc/The Rubbish World of Dave Spud
programme.desc: Dave and his friends are given a lesson in responsibility when their school assigns them an animal each to look after overnight.

programme.title: Mach à Seo!
programme.desc: Ramsay travels to the Moray and Aberdeenshire coasts for the ultimate weekend away. Ramsay a' lorg deireadh sheachdain sònraichte mu chladaichean Mhoireibh is Obar Dheathain.

programme.title: SpeakGaelic
programme.desc: June Graham drops in on Joy in the studio, while Calum Maclean investigates the environmental properties of the peatland of Strath Halladale in northern Scotland.

programme.title: An Là
programme.desc: Naidheachdan ionadail, nàiseanta is eadar-nàiseanta gach là cuide ri fiosrachadh coimhearsnachd bho BBC ALBA. Local, national and international news and information from BBC ALBA.

programme.title: Port an t-Òib
programme.desc: We meet the Maclennan family, who run the Valhalla fishing boat, and there's a trip with the shepherds to the island of Pabbay.

programme.title: Leonardo da Vinci - Deisciobal an Eòlais/The Disciple of Experience
programme.desc: Leonardo joins Duke Sforza's court and paints a monumental fresco.

programme.title: Skipinnish aig a' Chaisteal (Shorts)
programme.desc: Skipinnish le Land Below the Waves aig cuirm-chiùil bho Chaisteal Dhùn Èideann. Skipinnish perform Land Below the Waves at a concert from Edinburgh Castle.

programme.title: Julie Fowlis & Binneas - Kelvingrove
programme.desc: Cuirm le Julie Fowlis & còisir Binneas aig Kelvingrove. Bho Celtic Connections 2024. A performance by Julie Fowlis & Binneas at Kelvingrove. From Celtic Connections 2024.

programme.title: Cocain is na Klondykers
programme.desc: Journalist Anna MacLeod is on the trail of Operation Klondyke, the most expensive police and customs operation of the time. Contains scenes of drug use.

programme.title: Binneas - Na Trads

programme.title: Boban is Fuigheag

programme.title: Bing

programme.title: Pompon Am Mathan Beag/Pompon Little Bear

programme.title: An Teaghlach Rìoghail an Ath-dhoras/The Royals Next Door

programme.desc: Tha Yushi ri spòrs-uisge gu math annasach far a bheil tòrr chleasan rin ionnsachadh. Yushi competes in a unique water sport that requires him to learn all sorts of tricks.

programme.title: Stri
programme.desc: Tha Hannah a' farpais an aghaidh preasantairean CBBC ALBA ach saoil cò shoirbhicheas? Hannah competes against the CBBC ALBA presenters, but who will emerge victorious.

programme.title: Cop Out
programme.desc: Veteran detective Jimmy Monroe (Bruce Willis) needs money to pay for his daughter's upcoming wedding, so he decides it's time to sell his prized '52 Pafko baseball card. Before he can turn it into cash, it's stolen, and Jimmy and his partner, Paul (Tracy Morgan), confront a gangster who is obsessed with sports memorabilia. First, Jimmy and Paul have to rescue a beautiful murder-witness who has the key to a fortune in offshore bank accounts.

programme.title: You Hurt My Feelings
programme.desc: A novelist's long-standing marriage is suddenly upended when she overhears her husband give his honest reaction to her latest book.

programme.title: Volunteers
programme.desc: Hoping to avoid gambling debts, rich playboy Lawrence Bourne (Tom Hanks) stows away on a plane of Peace Corps volunteers set for Thailand. Once aboard, he meets the outrageously affable Tom Tuttle (John Candy), who shows him the ropes. After landing, the crew is stationed in a small town where they are to construct a bridge. Along with the lovely and altruistic Beth Wexler (Rita Wilson), the group begins work, but soon discover the CIA, communists and a drug lord are eyeing the bridge.

programme.title: Heaven Help Us
programme.desc: Students (Andrew McCarthy, Kevin Dillon) reject authority in 1965 Brooklyn at St. Basil's Catholic School for Boys.

programme.title: Bad Santa
programme.desc: In this dark comedy, the crotchety Willie T. Stokes (Billy Bob Thornton) and his partner (Tony Cox) reunite once a year for a holiday con. Posing as a mall Santa and his elf, they rip off shopping outlets on Christmas Eve. This year, however, Willie is falling apart. He's depressed and alcoholic, and his erratic behavior draws the suspicion of mall security (Bernie Mac). But when befriending a small boy brings out his kinder side, Willie begins to wonder if there is still some hope for him.

programme.title: The Player
programme.desc: Certain that the anonymous threats he's been receiving are the work of David Kahane (Vincent D'Onofrio), producer Griffin Mill (Tim Robbins) tries to fix things over cocktails. Instead, Griffin ends up murdering the screenwriter and courting the dead man's girlfriend (Greta Scacchi). As police investigate, Griffin concentrates on a prestigious film that might reinvigorate his career. But he soon learns that David's demise hasn't been forgotten by everyone in Hollywood.

programme.title: The Big Lebowski
programme.desc: Jeff Bridges plays Jeff Lebowski who insists on being called "the Dude," a laid-back, easygoing burnout who happens to have the same name as a millionaire whose wife owes a lot of dangerous people a whole bunch of money -- resulting in the Dude having his rug soiled, sending him spiraling into the Los Angeles underworld.

programme.title: Napoleon Dynamite
programme.desc: In small-town Preston, Idaho, awkward teen Napoleon Dynamite has trouble fitting in. After his grandmother is injured in an accident, his life is made even worse when his strangely nostalgic uncle, Rico, shows up to keep an eye on him. With no safe haven at home or at school, Napoleon befriends the new kid, Pedro, a morose Hispanic boy who speaks little English. Together the two launch a campaign to run for class president.

programme.title: Chillin Island
programme.desc: After a dune buggy crash, Young Thug descends from the heavens to rescue the crew; they discover what it means to be a snake.

programme.title: Chillin Island
programme.desc: On a journey through lush swamps with Lil Yachty, the crew learns about the legend of the Skunk Ape, a Yeti-like creature who looms large.

programme.title: Chillin Island
programme.desc: Alec, Dap and Lex try to catch fish, while a seasick Lil Tecca fishes for an excuse to go home.

programme.title: Chillin Island
programme.desc: Under the pretense of a spiritual journey, Ski Mask and the hosts arrive in the red desert.

programme.title: Chillin Island
programme.desc: On his sprawling property, Gunna struggles to convey his love of the great outdoors, while the crew once again struggle to survive in it.

programme.title: Chillin Island
programme.desc: It's the end of the world; with water scarce and hygiene obsolete, only Coi Leray and Rosalía can save the crew.

programme.title: Igor
programme.desc: Lab assistant Igor (John Cusack) dreams of becoming a mad scientist like his master, Dr. Glickenstein. When the doctor runs afoul of his own invention, Igor seizes the chance. With the help of his friends Scamper (Steve Buscemi) and Brain (Sean Hayes), Igor plans to win the kingdom's annual science fair by building the most-evil monster ever. The problem is that Eve (Molly Shannon), as the monster is called, is sweeter than sugar and would rather be an actress.

programme.title: Megamind
programme.desc: Though he is the most-brilliant supervillain the world has known, Megamind (Will Ferrell) is the least-successful. Thwarted time and again by heroic Metro Man (Brad Pitt), Megamind is more surprised than anyone when he actually manages to defeat his longtime enemy. But without Metro Man, Megamind has no purpose in life, so he creates a new opponent, who quickly decides that it's more fun to be a bad guy than a hero.

programme.title: Lyle, Lyle, Crocodile
programme.desc: When the Primm family moves to New York City, their young son, Josh, struggles to adapt to his new school and friends. All of that changes when he discovers Lyle, a singing crocodile that loves baths, caviar and great music. The two become fast friends, but when evil neighbor Mr. Grumps threatens Lyle's existence, the Primms must band together to show the world that family can come from the most unexpected places.

programme.title: Somebody Somewhere
programme.desc: Devastated by the recent loss of her sister, an increasingly unmoored Sam receives an unexpected lifeline from her co-worker Joel.

programme.title: Somebody Somewhere
programme.desc: Sam begins to bond with members of choir practice, but her friendship with Joel is threatened over outlooks on their future; after a disappointing review and a concerning visit to her parents' house, Sam seeks help from someone close to Holly.

programme.title: Somebody Somewhere
programme.desc: Sam and Joel go on a mission to uncover the source of Rick's sudden windfall; choir rehearsals give Sam the courage to share his worries about his mother, Mary Jo, with his father, Ed.

programme.title: Somebody Somewhere
programme.desc: After Pastor Deb asks for an impromptu meeting, Joel prepares for the worst and promptly breaks out in a vicious neck rash; with money tight, Sam gets creative in sourcing a solution for the upcoming corn harvest and confronts Rick.

programme.title: Somebody Somewhere
programme.desc: As a tornado touches down, Sam weathers a different kind of storm with Tricia.

programme.title: Somebody Somewhere
programme.desc: After receiving shocking news about her job, Sam reevaluates her life.

programme.title: Somebody Somewhere
programme.desc: In her quest to inspire Joel, Sam recruits a small team to help and reveals a new potential location for choir practice; on a purple party bus, Sam realizes just how far she's come.

programme.title: Somebody Somewhere
programme.desc: While he rents out his house, Joel and Sam revel in the highs of their temporary living situation and the lows of cleaning up after strangers; as a newly single Tricia prepares for an empty nest, Sam is overcome with unexpected emotion.

programme.title: Somebody Somewhere
programme.desc: At poker night, Fred throws Sam, Joel and Tiffani a curveball; Sam attends a former voice teacher's concert in hopes of becoming her student again with unforeseen consequences; Tricia feels the effects of a small town filled with big talkers.

programme.title: Somebody Somewhere
programme.desc: As Mary Jo's behavior worsens, Sam and Tricia grapple with the difficult decision to escalate her care; as Tricia pitches her services for Fred and Susan's wedding, Joel has a crisis of faith; Sam struggles to get back in touch with her instrument.

programme.title: Somebody Somewhere
programme.desc: While Sam and Tricia are forced to reveal why they're taking their mother to Wichita, Joel blows his own cover stalking Brad.

programme.title: Somebody Somewhere
programme.desc: While celebrating Tricia's birthday, Sam is blindsided by surprising new information about Holly; as Charity's lies continue to affect Tricia's social life, Joel makes a move with Brad, which leads to a misstep with Sam.

programme.title: Somebody Somewhere
programme.desc: Distancing herself from Joel, Sam concentrates on helping Tricia with her blossoming pillow business, which soon faces sabotage from Charity; Fred attempts to play peacemaker with Sam and Joel.

programme.title: Somebody Somewhere
programme.desc: After reuniting with Joel at a funeral, Sam takes stock of herself and her actions and decides to make things right with her best friend; everyone comes together for an epic celebration of love and partnership at Fred and Susan's wedding.

programme.title: Somebody Somewhere
programme.desc: Sam considers adopting a roommate of her own as Joel and Brad move in together; Tricia gets back into the dating scene after finalizing her divorce.

programme.title: Somebody Somewhere
programme.desc: Overwhelmed by the amount of change happening in the lives of her loved ones, Sam is hit especially hard by a friend's brutally honest comment; Sam helps Brad with a special task ahead of his and Joel's housewarming.

programme.title: Somebody Somewhere
programme.desc: Tricia shakes things up at the country club; Joel and Brad navigate their new normal; Sam finally sees a doctor.

programme.title: Somebody Somewhere
programme.desc: Sam and Tricia's trip to Kansas City hits an unexpected snag; Joel runs into a complicated figure from his past at Brad's bible book club.

programme.title: Somebody Somewhere
programme.desc: Surrounded by her sister and chosen family on Thanksgiving, Sam gains a better appreciation of what it means to love.

programme.title: Somebody Somewhere
programme.desc: Joel finds himself feeling unstable after an accident; Sam realizes her deepest insecurities as she goes on a date with Iceland.

programme.title: Somebody Somewhere
programme.desc: Joel returns to his old parish; Sam and Tricia realize that they have both forgotten Holly's birthday; Sam gives Iceland a chance.

programme.title: The House
programme.desc: Scott and Kate Johansen must figure out a way to earn some money after their daughter's scholarship falls through. When all else fails, the desperate couple join forces with their neighbor Frank to start an underground casino in his home. As the cash rolls in and the good times fly, Scott and Kate soon learn that they may have bitten off more than they can chew.

programme.title: Death of a Unicorn
programme.desc: A weekend retreat has deadly consequences when a father and daughter accidentally hit and kill a unicorn while en route to find his billionaire boss, who seeks to exploit the creature's miraculous curative properties.

programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: We all have a superhero inside of us -- it just takes a bit of magic to bring it out. In 14-year-old Billy Batson's case, all he needs to do is shout out one word to transform into the adult superhero Shazam. Still a kid at heart, Shazam revels in the new version of himself by doing what any other teen would do -- have fun while testing out his newfound powers. But he'll need to master them quickly before the evil Dr. Thaddeus Sivana can get his hands on Shazam's magical abilities.

programme.title: Shazam! Fury of the Gods
programme.desc: Bestowed with the powers of the gods, Billy Batson and his fellow foster kids are still learning how to juggle teenage life with their adult superhero alter egos. When a vengeful trio of ancient gods arrives on Earth in search of the magic stolen from them long ago, Shazam and his allies get thrust into a battle for their superpowers, their lives, and the fate of the world.

programme.title: The Hangover
programme.desc: Two days before his wedding, Doug (Justin Bartha) and three friends (Bradley Cooper, Ed Helms, Zach Galifianakis) drive to Las Vegas for a wild and memorable stag party. In fact, when the three groomsmen wake up the next morning, they can't remember a thing; nor can they find Doug. With little time to spare, the three hazy pals try to re-trace their steps and find Doug so they can get him back to Los Angeles in time to walk down the aisle.

programme.title: The Sitter
programme.desc: Noah Griffith (Jonah Hill) is stuck in a rut; he's been kicked out of college, and his self-absorbed girlfriend, Marisa (Ari Graynor), treats him poorly. All Noah wants to do these days is watch TV, but as a favor to his mother, he agrees to baby-sit a neighbor's three freakish children: Slater (Max Records), Blithe (Landry Bender) and Rodrigo (Kevin Hernandez). Coerced to score some drugs for Marisa in exchange for sex, Noah must take the terrible trio along on a wild odyssey through New York.

programme.title: Fist Fight
programme.desc: On the last day before summer vacation, high school teacher Andy Campbell tries his best to keep it together amid senior pranks, a dysfunctional administration and budget cuts that threaten his job. Things go from bad to worse when he crosses Ron Strickland, the school's toughest and most feared teacher. When Strickland gets fired, he challenges Campbell to a fight after school. As news of the showdown spreads like wildfire, poor Andy desperately seeks any way out of his date with certain doom.

programme.title: The Big Year
programme.desc: Three men find that they have come to a turning point. Stu (Steve Martin) faces a late-life crisis, Kenny (Owen Wilson) is in the grip of a midlife crisis, and Brad (Jack Black) is wallowing in a no-life crisis. Determined to kick-start their stagnant lives, Stu, Kenny and Brad decide to enter a prestigious contest. During the course of one calendar year, the three friendly rivals criss-cross North America in a quest to count more species of birds than anyone else.

programme.title: Y2K
programme.desc: On the last night of 1999, two high school juniors crash a New Year's Eve party, only to find themselves fighting for their lives when the terror of Y2K becomes a reality and all machines rise up against humanity.

programme.title: Yogi Bear
programme.desc: Yogi (Dan Aykroyd) and his sidekick, Boo Boo (Justin Timberlake), are Jellystone Park's most-notorious troublemakers, hatching countless schemes to separate park visitors from their vittles. Standing in the way of picnic perfection is their long-suffering nemesis, Ranger Smith (Tom Cavanagh). But when Mayor Brown announces his plans to sell Jellystone Park to loggers, Yogi, Boo Boo and Ranger Smith must join forces to save their beloved campground from closing forever.

programme.title: Enter the Warriors Gate
programme.desc: A mysterious chest opens a gateway through time that transports teenage gamer Jack to an ancient empire. Jack will need all of his gaming skills to battle a cruel barbarian king, protect a beautiful princess and find his way back home.

programme.title: Nikki Glaser: Someday You'll Die
programme.desc: Nikki Glaser dives into a wide range of topics including why she doesn't want kids, the harsh realities of aging, her sexual fantasies, and plans for her own death all in her hilarious, unapologetic, and brutally honest style.

programme.title: Lil Rel Howery: I Said It. Y'all Thinking It.
programme.desc: Lil Rel Howery brings his signature storytelling style and impressions to the Chicago Theater, getting real on topics such as fame, fatherhood and therapy.

programme.title: Brett Goldstein: The Second Best Night of Your Life
programme.desc: Brett Goldstein, a comedian, writer, actor and swimmer, begins his next big adventure.

programme.title: John Early: Now More Than Ever
programme.desc: John Early brings his unique blend of cutting commentary and pop star swagger to Roulette Intermedium in Brooklyn, N.Y.; in the style of a gritty 70s rockumentary, Early performs stand-up and explosive song covers from Britney to Neil Young.

programme.title: Jerrod Carmichael: Rothaniel
programme.desc: Jerrod Carmichael performs before a live audience at the legendary Blue Note Jazz Club in New York City.

programme.title: Mountainhead
programme.desc: Four friends reunite during worldwide economic turmoil.

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Still haunted by Beetlejuice, Lydia's life gets turned upside down when her daughter discovers a portal to the afterlife. When someone says Beetlejuice's name three times, the mischievous demon returns to unleash his very own brand of mayhem.

programme.title: The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
programme.desc: Some British retirees (Judi Dench, Maggie Smith, Bill Nighy) decide to outsource their retirement to exotic -- and less expensive -- India. Lured by advertisements for the newly restored Marigold Hotel and imagining a life of leisure in lush surroundings, they arrive and find that the Marigold is actually a shell of its former self. Though their new home is not quite what they had imagined, the retirees find that life and love can begin again when they let go of their pasts.

programme.title: Spaceballs
programme.desc: In a distant galaxy, planet Spaceball has depleted its air supply, leaving its citizens reliant on a product called "Perri-Air." In desperation, Spaceball's leader President Skroob (Mel Brooks) orders the evil Dark Helmet (Rick Moranis) to kidnap Princess Vespa (Daphne Zuniga) of oxygen-rich Druidia and hold her hostage in exchange for air. But help arrives for the Princess in the form of renegade space pilot Lone Starr (Bill Pullman) and his half-man, half-dog partner, Barf (John Candy).

programme.title: Woman at War
programme.desc: Halla is a 50-year-old environmental activist who crusades against the local aluminum industry in Iceland. As her actions grow bolder, her life changes in the blink of an eye when she's finally granted permission to adopt a girl from the Ukraine.

programme.title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: The Long Haul
programme.desc: Young Greg Heffley is looking forward to a long summer of just hanging out, but his mother throws a monkey wrench into his plans when she forces the entire family to take a road trip for a relative's birthday celebration. His eyes soon light up after he realizes that the excursion is his ticket to a gaming convention to meet YouTube sensation Mac Digby. Greg's imagination then kicks into overdrive as he sneakily hatches a scheme to attend the expo and gain some much-deserved fame.

programme.title: Tracey Ullman: Live & Exposed
programme.desc: The comic performs her autobiographical show in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Entre nos presents: Frankie Quiñones Superhomies

programme.desc: Actress-writer-comic Gina Brillon performs.

programme.desc: Rising comedian and single father Jerry Garcia makes fun of himself, his parenting style, and his dating life.

programme.desc: The comic performs in front of an arena crowd in San Antonio.
